CatDescriptText: Image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 23, 1963, pg. 22. Portion of accompanying article begins: "As a little boy, Cassius Marcellus Clay was a source of pride to his attractive mother and favorite rooter, Mrs. Clay.  During a recent visit to Pittsburgh the life-long native of Louisville, Ky., revealed to this reporter how people used to stop her on the street and remark just how much her Cassius resembled Joe Louis, possibly the greatest of all heavyweight champions...."
TitMainTitle: Boxer Muhammad Ali (Cassius Clay) lifting his mother Odessa Grady Clay, in room at Carlton House Hotel
